page.title: 15MUNCHING IN MOUNTSORREL
page.content: In Mountsorrel there are 8 Public Houses, one cafe, one Chinese take-away. Most of the Public houses provide food in the form of either a hot lunch or a cold meal, or just a cob. Along the A6 there is the transport cafe, where lorry drivers can enjoy an early morning fried breakfast with a pot of tea and chat with their friends. It also provides mid-day meals & teas. The Chinese takeaway has recently changed the location of its premises from opposite the Buttermarket to a larger building a quarter of a km along the A6 towards Loughborough. It seems to be very popular and convenient way of having a meal. It supplies hot food in silver foil containers which consists of things such as rice and vegetables.
